receive() - Method in interface com.flipkart.lois.channel.api.ReceiveChannel
Receive a message of Type T if message is available or block the thread and put it in wait state until there is a message available.

SimplePassByRefChannel<T> - Class in com.flipkart.lois.channel.impl
